evidence_in_dialogue: [[Catherine]] found blood ... in my trash can ?
[[Grissom]] the organic poison came back snake venom
[[Nick]] prints came back to somebody named 'kelly easton '
[[Grissom]] the elisa test came back positive for alpha-neurotoxins
[[Snake_Handler]] she said her co-worker asked her to snake-sit
[[Catherine]] it's what the evidence tells us really happened
